details.title: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi approved, says Goyal; to provide direct income support for farmers
details.content:
To give assured income support for small and marginal farmers, Goyal says the Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi has been approved. Expected to benefit 12 crore farmers with under two hectares of land against their name. Rs 6000 per year in direct income support for these farmers is what it will assure. Ticks off the first box of expected budget sop - on farm support.


Expert view from our columnist Shankkar Aiyar: Cost Rs 75000 Crore/Year; Big question: What about landless/tenant farmers?

That's Rs 500/pm

#Budget2019

Q: What about landless/tenant farmers?

— Shankkar Aiyar (@ShankkarAiyar) February 1, 2019

Announced a hike in minimum support price by 1.5 times for all 22 crops
Also, an attempt to reward distressed farmers who repay loans: All farmers severely affected by severe natural calamities will get 2% interest waiver and additional 3% interest waiver upon timely repayment of loans. This is in place of loan waivers
Without disturbing the existing reservation system, a 10% reservation for Economically weaker sections in educational institutions and government jobs has been ensured: FM
Gratuity limit increased from 10 lakh to 30 lakh rupees.

75 per cent of woman beneficiaries under PM Mudra Yojana, 26 weeks of maternity leave and Pradhan Mantri Matritva Yojana, are all empowering women: FM

Impactful steps taken in reducing tax, bringing benefits for middle class citizens: FM

• 99.54% returns have been accepted without any scrutiny.
  • Within almost two years, almost all assessment and verification of I-T returns will be done electronically by an anonymized tax system without any intervention by tax officials.
  • Direct tax collections from 6.38 lakh crore rupees in 2013-14 to almost 12 lakh crore rupees; tax base up from 3.79 crore to 6.85 crore.
  • Simplification of direct tax system will benefit taxpayers; direct tax reduced and tax interface made simpler and faceless to make life easier; resulting in increase in tax collections and return filings.

GST collections in January 2019 has crossed 1 lakh crore rupee

Committed to eliminating the scourge of black money; anti-black money measures taken have brought an undisclosed income of about 1.30 lakh crore rupees to the fore; 3.38 lakh shell companies were deregistered: FM

details.title: BREAKING: Big tax announcements
details.content:
• Individual taxpayers with annual income upto 5 lakh rupees to get full tax rebate. Up from Rs 2 lakh 50 thousand earlier. Benefit to these taxpayers- Rs 12,500. Fine print - These benefits will not be extended to those earning above Rs 500000.
  • Individuals with gross income up to 6.5 lakh rupees will not need to pay any tax if they make investments in provident funds and prescribed equities Standard tax deduction for salaried persons raised from 40,000 rupees to 50,000 rupees
  • TDS threshold on interest on bank and post office deposits raised from 10,000 to 40,000 rupees
  • Benefits under Sec 80 (i) BA (Affordable Housing scheme/House for all) being extended for one more year, for all housing projects approved till end of 2019-2020
This is not just an Interim Budget, this is a vehicle for the developmental transformation of the nation: FM Piyush Goyal
